name: SIGMA
description: $SIGMA Coin on Ethereum is the original SIGMA token, marking the first of its kind deployed across all blockchain chains. Minted on April 17, 2023, at 07:41:11 AM UTC, $SIGMA represents the pinnacle of crypto dominance. This innovative token is specifically tailored for those who lead with unwavering confidence and refuse to compromise. Designed to empower financial conquests, $SIGMA serves as the ultimate symbol of strength and resilience for true alphas who aspire to redefine success on their own terms.
